data.title: My Family Tree
data.text:
Information on these families also came from the Hugh McArthur genealogy by Donna Phillips on the Island Register, the Dyment genealogy by Roger Dyment and Connie Ladner, and The Descendants of Henry Oliver Boulter and Maria Gard by Robert Boulter, as well as census and other records.

23. John S "Edwin" Boulter was born on 15 Jun 1850 in O'Leary, PEI. Died in 1933 in Milburn West, PEI. Buried in 8, 6, 5, Glenwood, PEI, CN, United Ch Cem.

He married Sarah Ann MacArthur on 28 Oct 1874 in Milburn West, PEI. Sarah Ann MacArthur was born on 6 Oct 1848 in O'Leary, PEI. Died on 30 Dec 1935 in Milburn, PEI. Buried in 8, 6, 5, Glenwood, PEI, CN, United Ch Cem.

They had the following child(ren):

92 i. Margaret Boulter was born about 1875 in Milburn West, PEI, CN. Died in 1888/1894. Not in 1891 census.

+93 ii. Wilfred (Mark Wilfred) Boulter

+94 iii. Ella M Boulter

+95 iv. John Webster Wadman Boulter

+96 v. Edmund Morton "Edwin" "Ned" Boulter

97 vi. Heber Boulter was born in 1889.

98 vii. George Nelson Boulter was born on 4 Apr 1890. Died on 4 Aug 1973 in West Point, PEI. Buried in 8, 6, 0, Glenwood, PEI, CN, United Ch Cem.

99 viii. Watson Boulter was born in 1891. Died in 1891. Buried in 8, 6, 0, Glenwood, PEI, CN, United Ch Cem.

100 ix. Edward ? Boulter

+101 x. Watson Boulter

1891 census: Wilfred (13), Ella (12), Webster (10), Heber (8), Edwin (4), Robert (1); 1929 Cummings Atlas: Webster, Wilfred, Heber, Ella, Edmund, and Watson.
